doc: The pathname to a SDF file containing the chemical system for which constraints should be generated.

Defines one or more SMARTS-based rules for generating constraints. Rules are separated by newline characters (i.e., each rule is defined in a single line). In each line, each space-separated string (i.e., a word) is interpreted as following: each word is considered a single SMARTS until a word is found that corresponds to any keyword (see below). Once the first keyword is found no more words will be interpreted as SMARTS. The order of the SMARTS is retained and used to generate the ordered tuple of atom indexes. Recognized keywords are (case-insensitive):
 --> 'GetCurrentValue': requests the determination of the value of the internal coordinate defined by the tuple: distance, angle, or dihedral angle.
 --> 'Value=<number>' to specify a value to assign to the constraint independently from the current value.
 --> 'OnlyBonded': limits to tuples of atoms to those that are connected to form a path visiting the tuple in the orded given by the order of the SMARTS. For example, a SMARTS-based rule for tuple '[#1] [#6] [#7]' may be limited to match only substructures where the H atom is connected with any bond to the C atom, which is connected with any bond to the N atom.
 --> 'Prefix=<text with spaces>' to specify a text to be placed before the list of atom indexes.
 --> 'Suffix=<text with spaces>' to specify text to be placed after the list of atom indexes).

Defines one or more (0-based) index-based rules for generating constraints. Rules are separated by newline characters (i.e., each rule is defined in a single line). In each line, each space-separated string (i.e., a word) is interpreted as following: each word is considered a single index until a word is found that corresponds to any keyword (see below). Once the first keyword is found no more words will be interpreted as an index. The order of the indexes is retained. Recognized keywords are (case-insensitive):
 --> 'GetCurrentValue': requests the determination of the value of the internal coordinate defined by the tuple: distance, angle, or dihedral angle.
 --> 'Value=<number>' to specify a value to assign to the constraint independently from the current value.
 --> 'OnlyBonded': limits to tuples of atoms to those that are connected to form a path visiting the tuple in the orded given by the order of the indexes. For example, creates a constrain on angle '0 1 2' only if atom 0 is connected with any bond to atom 1, which is connected with any bond to atom 2.
 --> 'Prefix=<text with spaces>' to specify a text to be placed before the list of atom indexes.
 --> 'Suffix=<text with spaces>' to specify text to be placed after the list of atom indexes).
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
